Subject: RE: LD KWT - MUFE and GIVENCHY Insurance Cost
--------------------------------------------------
Dear @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> ,

 

Hope all is well.

Could you please share how the BU allocation of attached cost was calculated.

Make up Forever and Givenchy were charged, however for these brands incoterm is CIF and insurance is paid by supplier, we were not expecting to have any insurance related charges.

 

Thanks,

Marina

 

MARINA ZAKHAROVA	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ FINANCE	
C.G.R. FZE	
DUBAI

Sent: Wednesday, July 2, 2025 3:46 PM
To: George Ayoub <George.Ayoub@chalhoub.com <mailto:George.Ayoub@chalhoub.com> >; Mustafa Ali <Mustafa.Ali@chalhoub.com <mailto:Mustafa.Ali@chalhoub.com> >; Muller Karas <Muller.Karas@chalhoub.com <mailto:Muller.Karas@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Souad AlKharrat <Souad.AlKharrat@chalhoub.com <mailto:Souad.AlKharrat@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: LD KWT - MUFE and GIVENCHY Insurance Cost

 

Hello George, Mustafa, Muller,

 

Hope you are well.

In June H&C paid for attached Marine insurance, total cost was split across multiple brands (also attaching allocations summary in AED).

MUFE and Givenchy were charged 21k USD, however, as per my info incoterm is CIF, and I assume this insurance should be paid by supplier.

Could you please confirm if my understanding is correct, if so what is the agreement on recharge process.

 

In case you suspect the charge was wrongly allocated to MUFE/ GIV please also let me know.

 

Thanks,

Marina

 

 

 

MARINA ZAKHAROVA

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ FINANCE

C.G.R. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
